attributes.action: hold a referendum on the Lisbon treaty which we believe to be little more than an EU constitution in a different guise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The treaty of Lisbon was agreed after the EU constitution was rejected in referendums by French and Dutch voters.  The "treaty" is said by many to be largely the same as the failed constitution, but the government has decided that, despite promising a referendum on the constitution in its manifesto, none is required now as the Lisbon treaty and the constitution are different.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
